# decorator

The `llm.call` decorator for turning `PromptTemplate` functions into LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/decorator/index" symbolName="Client" /> Client

The base interface for LLM clients.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/decorator/index" symbolName="Params" /> Params

The base interface for LLM parameters.
